Webex Desktop Clients (Mac/PC, including WebApp the browser based thin client) connecting to Webex Meetings
On-prem SIP/H323 devices calling into (or being called back from) a Webex Meeting
Webex Mobile Clients (iOS, Android) connecting to Webex Meetings
Webex Meetings site performance analytics and Webex App
Used for Slido PPT add-in and to allow Slido webpages to create polls/quizzes in pre-meeting

If you have Webex app Desktop Clients, Cloud Registered Devices (including Webex Boards) connecting to Webex Meetings, you also need to allow the list of domains outlined in https://help.webex.com/WBX000028782/Network-Requirements-for-Webex-Teams-Services
